December 12
## [How to keep your holiday party allergy free](https://abcnews.go.com/GMA/GMA3/video/holiday-party-allergy-free-128351333)
"GMA" sponsor ARS Pharma and food allergy advocate Hillary Tolle Carter team up to share ways to make food allergies a non-factor at your holiday gatherings this year.

## [Italian cuisine makes UNESCO history](https://abcnews.go.com/International/video/italian-cuisine-makes-unesco-history-intangible-cultural-heritage-128326630)
Italy is raising a glass and saying "salute" after becoming the first country in history to have an entire cuisine added to UNESCO's Intangible Cultural Heritage of Humanity list.
December 11
[
](https://abcnews.go.com/International/video/italian-cuisine-makes-unesco-history-intangible-cultural-heritage-128326630)
December 11
## [How to get a dozen Krispy Kreme glazed donuts for $1](https://abcnews.go.com/GMA/Food/1-dozen-krispy-kreme-glazed-donuts-day-dozens/story?id=128309822)
On Friday Dec. 12, 2025, Krispy Kreme customers who buy a dozen donuts or 16 minis can get a dozen glazed donuts for $1.
